CTRL-K
Global De-Fi Market Data
GET
https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/global/decentralized_finance_defi

This endpoint allows you query top 100 cryptocurrency global decentralized finance (DeFi) data including DeFi market cap, trading volume

üìò

Notes

Cache / Update Frequency: every 60 minutes for all the API plans.
RESPONSE
200

Get cryptocurrency global decentralized finance (defi) data

RESPONSE BODY
object
data
object
defi_market_cap
string

defi market cap

eth_market_cap
string

eth market cap

defi_to_eth_ratio
string

defi to eth ratio

trading_volume_24h
string

defi trading volume in 24 hours

defi_dominance
string

defi dominance

top_coin_name
string

defi top coin name

top_coin_defi_dominance
number

defi top coin dominance

Updated about 1 month ago

Crypto Global Market Data
üíº Global Market Cap Chart Data
Did this page help you?
Yes
No
LANGUAGE
Shell
Node
Ruby
PHP
Python
CREDENTIALS
Header
Log in to use your API keys
CURL REQUEST
1
curl --request GET \
2
     --url https://pro-api.coingecko.com/api/v3/global/decentralized_finance_defi \
3
     --header 'accept: application/json'
Try It!
RESPONSE
200
EXAMPLE
1

2
